name: Proximal
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Demonstrate liver, celiac vessels, and spine.
Celiac vessels =  seagull sign.
Measure the AP diameter.
Measure from outer wall to outer wall.
optimize: Disperse bowel gas with gentle pressure.
measure: Normal aorta < 3 cm.

name: Mid
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Demonstrate spine and renal vessels if possible.
SMA = mantle clock.
Measure the AP diameter.
Measure from outer wall to outer wall.
optimize: Disperse bowel gas with gentle pressure.
measure: Normal aorta < 3 cm.

name: Distal
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Demonstrate spine.
Measure the AP diameter.
Measure outer to outer at maximum diameter.
optimize: Disperse bowel gas with gentle pressure.
measure: Normal aorta < 3 cm.

name: Bifurcation
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Measure the AP diameter.
Measure from outer wall to outer wall.
measure: Normal iliac arteries < 1.5 cm.
optimize: Disperse bowel gas with gentle pressure.

name: Sagittal
dostring: Demonstrate the aorta from the proximal to the distal end.
optimize: Disperse bowel gas with gentle pressure.
measure: Measure 2 cm distal to the SMA.

name: Sagittal Measurement
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Demonstrate the aorta in the proximal sagittal frame.
Measure 2 cm distal to the SMA, perpendicular to flow.
Measure outer wall to outer wall.
optimize: Disperse bowel gas with gentle pressure.
measure:
Normal aorta < 3 cm.
Normal iliac arteries < 1.5 cm.

name: Parasternal Long
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Demonstrate descending thoracic aorta.
Display marker must be on the left side of the screen.
Probe marker must be directed towards the hip.
measure:
Ejection fraction
   Normal: 55-65%
   Mildly depressed: 45-55%
   Moderately depressed:  30-45%
   Severely depressed: < 30% 
   Hyperdynamic: "kissing paps"

name: Parasternal Short
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Levels may be aquired as a single image or as separate images.
Obtain view at the level of the papillaries.
Look for wall motion abnormalities or RV strain (D-sign)
optimize: Rotate the probe on your best parasternal long axis view.

name: Apical Four Chamber
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
The interventricular septum should be vertical.
Measureme at level of valve anulus
optimize: Drag and drop the probe from the parasternal short axis view.
measure: Normal right ventricle size is 0.6 of left ventricle.

name: Subxiphoid
optimize:
Scan through the liver as an acoustic window.
Have the patient take a deep breath.

name: Common Femoral Vein
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Demonstrate the saphenofemoral junction.
Demonstrate complete apposition of the vessel walls.
optimize: It is easier to compress if the probe is perpendicular to the vessel.

name: Superficial Femoral Vein
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Compress every 1-2 cm along medial thigh, to the adductor canal.
Demonstrate complete apposition of the vessel walls.
optimize: It is easier to compress if the probe is perpendicular to the vessel.

name: Popliteal Vein
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Demonstrate the popliteal vein and the trifurcation.
Demonstrate complete apposition of the vessel walls.
optimize: In the Pop, vein on top.

name: RUQ
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Demonstrate lung - diaphragm - spine- liver - Morison's pouch - caudal tip of the liver - inferior renal pole.
Perform a smooth slide.

name: LUQ
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Demonstrate lung - diaphragm - spleen - caudal tip of the spleen - inferior renal pole.
Perform a smooth slide.

name: Suprapubic Sag/Trans
dostring:
Can be either Sagittal or Transverse view.
Scan at the highest part of the hemithorax.
Show one intercostal space at anterior lung
Fan edge to edge.

name: Suprapubic Trans
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Fan edge to edge.

name: Subxiphoid
optimize: Have the patient take a deep breath.
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Fan edge to edge.

name: Right Lung
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Slide through at least 3 intercostal spaces.

name: Left Lung
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Slide through at least 2 intercostal spaces.

name: Sagittal
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Depict portal vein.
Focus on gallbladder neck.
optimize: Have the patient take a deep breath.

name: Transverse
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Depict portal vein.
Focus on gallbladder neck.
optimize: Have the patient take a deep breath.

name: Anterior Wall
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Measure the anterior wall of the gallbladder.
optimize: Use zoom.
measure: Normal GB wall < 3 mm.

name: Common Bile Duct
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Measure the CBD as (a) a channel above the portal vein as it enters the porta hepatis, or (b) Mickey mouse ear, or (c) a channel above the transverse portal vein.
Measure inner wall to inner wall.
optimize: Use color flow to distinguish hepatic artery and CBD
measure:
Normal CBD < 6 mm.
5mm + 1m per decade of life after 50 y/o

name: Heart
dostring:
Demonstrate 2 views.
Preferably parasternal long axis and apical four chamber view.
measure:
Ejection fraction
   Normal: 55-65%
   Mildly depressed: 45-55%
   Moderately depressed:  30-45%
   Severely depressed: < 30% 
   Hyperdynamic: "kissing paps"

name: IVC
dostring:
Assess volume status and volume tolerance.
Perform measurements 2 cm from the diaphragm and 1 cm from the hepatic vein.
measure:
Diameter 1.5 - 2.5 = normal.
Collapsibility Index > 50% = fluid responsive.

name: Morison's Pouch
dostring: Demonstrate 1 view.

name: Aorta
dostring: Demonstrate any 2 views.

name: Pulmonary
dostring: Demonstrate 2 views.
optimize:
Reduce depth to 5 cm to assess pleural line.
Increase depth to 12-15 cm to assess B-lines.

name: IVC Diameter
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Assess volume status.
Perform measurements just caudal to the hepatic vein confluence.
Measure perpendicular to flow.
Measure inner wall to inner wall.
optimize:
The IVC walls will appear bright white when the probe is perpendicular to them.
Use B mode imaging to measure respiratory variation
measure: Diameter 1.5 cm - 2.5 = normal.

name: IVC Collapsibility
dostring:
Perform in M-mode.
Assess volume tolerance.
Perform measurements 2 cm from the diaphragm or 1 cm from the hepatic vein.
Measure IVC diameter with inspiration and expiration.
measure: Collapsability index (CI) = IVC max - IVC min / IVC max

name: Sagittal Uterus
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Fan through the entire uterus.
Look for multiple and extra-uterine gestations.
Confirm IUP with yolk sac+.
optimize:
Gestational sac/double decidual sign is insufficient to confirm IUP.
Take a close look at the adnexa.

name: Transverse Uterus
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Fan through the entire uterus.
Look for multiple and extra-uterine gestations.
Confirm IUP with yolk sac+.
optimize:
Gestational sac/double decidual sign is insufficient to confirm IUP.
Take a close look at the adnexa.

name: EMM
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Measure from edge of gestational sac to outer edge of the myometrium.
optimize: Use Zoom.
measure: Normal EMM > 8 mm.

name: Fetal Heart Rate
dostring:
Use M-mode.
Select two peaks 1 or 2 beats apart (machine dependent).
optimize:
Avoid pulse wave doppler.
Use zoom.
measure: Normal FHR: 120 - 160 bpm.

name: Sagittal
dostring:
Fan through the entire uterus.
Look for multiple gestations.

name: Transverse Uterus
dostring:
Fan through the entire uterus.
Look for multiple gestations.

name: Biparietal Diameter
dostring: Measure from outer edge to inner edge, perpandicular to the falx cerebri.

name: Head Circumference
dostring: Place ruler markers at either end of the falx cerebri.

name: Femur Length
dostring: Measure from end to end of femur.

name: Fetal Heart Rate
dostring:
Use M-mode.
Select two peaks 1 or 2 beats apart (machine dependent).
optimize:
Avoid pulse wave doppler.
Use zoom.

name: Transverse Ocular
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Demonstrate vitreous chamber with fanning from one edge to other edge.
optimize:
Increase gain to better visualize hemorrhage and detachment.
Use a lot of gel avoid applying direct pressure to the globe

name: Transverse ONSD
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Measure 3 mm behind retina.
Measure perpendicular to axis of optic nerve.
measure:
Normal ONSD < 5 mm.
Grey zone = 5 - 6 mm.
Abnormal ONSD > 6 mm.
Use a lot of gel avoid applying direct pressure to the globe

name: Sagittal Ocular
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Demonstrate vitreous chamber with fanning from one edge to other edge.
optimize:
Increase gain to better visualize hemorrhage and detachment.
Use a lot of gel avoid applying direct pressure to the globe

name: Sagittal ONSD
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Measure 3 mm behind retina.
Measure perpendicular to axis of optic nerve.
optimize:
Average the value obtained with the sagittal ONSD.
Use a lot of gel avoid applying direct pressure to the globe
measure:
Normal ONSD < 5 mm.
Grey zone = 5 - 6 mm.
Abnormal ONSD > 6 mm.
Average the value obtained with the sagittal ONSD.

name: Sagittal
dostring: Save a loop or video.
optimize: Ask the patient to take a deep breath to push the kidney push the kidney caudad.
measure: Normal length = 11 +/- 2 cm.

name: Measurement
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Measure the kidney in two planes.
measure: Normal length = 11 +/- 2 cm.

name: Transverse
dostring: Fan edge to edge.
optimize: Have the patient to take a deep breath to push the kidney caudad.
measure:
Normal length = 11 +/- 2 cm.
Measure degree of hydronephrosis (can be in saggital or transverse view)
 -Minor shows dilitation of the major cal
 -Moderate shows dilation of minor.
 -Severe shows entire collecting system and thinning of renal cortex.

name: Sagittal
measure:
Normal length = 11 +/- 2 cm.
Measure degree of hydronephrosis (can be in saggital or transverse view)
 -Minor shows dilitation of the major cal
 -Moderate shows dilation of minor.
 -Severe shows entire collecting system and thinning of renal cortex.

name: Measurement
dostring: Measure the kidney in two planes.
measure: Normal length = 11 +/- 2 cm.

name: Transverse Bladder
dostring: Measure 1 plane (-).

name: Sagittal Bladder
dostring:
Measure in 2 planes (+).
Bladder jets is required.

name: Abnormal Trans
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Demonstrate normal area with the "mow the lawn" technique.

name: Abnormal Sag
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Demonstrate normal area with the "mow the lawn" technique.

name: Fluid Collection
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Measure the size of the fluid collection in 2 planes.
Measure the depth.

name: Right Anterior
dostring: Start at the midclavicular line, and slide inferiorly.
measure:
Assess for pneumothorax = 3-4cm
Else:
Minimum depth = 15cm.
Acute interstitial syndrome = at least 3 B-lines in 2 rib spaces on both sides of the chest.

name: Right Lateral
dostring: Start at the anterior axillary line, and slide inferiorly.
measure:
Assess for pneumothorax = 3-4cm
Else:
Minimum depth = 15cm.
Minimum depth of 15cm to assess for B lines.
Acute interstitial syndrome = at least 3 B-lines in 2 rib spaces on both sides of the chest.

name: Right Posterior
dostring:
Perform on posterior thorax.
May be combined with the diaphragm view.
measure:
Assess for pneumothorax = 3-4cm
Acute interstitial syndrome = at least 3 B-lines in 2 rib spaces on both sides of the chest.

name: Right Diaphragm
dostring: Demonstrate lung, diaphragm and spine.
optimize: Ask the patient to take a deep breath.
measure: Pleural effusion = positive spine sign, loss of mirror image, and positive curtain sign.

name: Left Anterior
dostring: Start at the midclavicular line, and slide inferiorly.
measure:
Assess for pneumothorax = 3-4cm
Else:
Minimum depth = 15cm.
Acute interstitial syndrome = at least 3 B-lines in 2 rib spaces on both sides of the chest.

name: Left Lateral
dostring: Start at the anterior axillary line, and slide inferiorly.
measure:
Assess for pneumothorax = 3-4cm
Else:
Minimum depth = 15cm.
Minimum depth of 15cm to assess for B lines.
Acute interstitial syndrome = at least 3 B-lines in 2 rib spaces on both sides of the chest.

name: Left Posterior
dostring:
Perform on posterior thorax.
May be combined with the diaphragm view.
measure:
Assess for pneumothorax = 3-4cm
Acute interstitial syndrome = at least 3 B-lines in 2 rib spaces on both sides of the chest.

name: Left Diaphragm
dostring: Demonstrate lung, diaphragm and spine.
optimize: Ask the patient to take a deep breath.
measure: Pleural effusion = positive spine sign, loss of mirror image, and positive curtain sign.

name: Sagittal Bowel
dostring:
Save a still image or frame or video.
Demonstrate compressibility.
Measure size.
optimize: Investigate area of maximal pain and tenderness.
measure:
Obstruction:
Dilated bowel loop (diameter > 3 cm).
Ineffective peristalsis ("to and fro" or "whirling").
Keyboard sign.

name: Transverse Bowel
dostring:
Save a still image or frame or video.
Demonstrate compressibility.
Measure size.
optimize: Investigate area of maximal pain and tenderness.
measure:
Signs of ischemia:
Extraluminal free fluid.
The "pointy" triangular appearance of inter-loop free fluid (tanga sign).
Loss of peristalsis.
Bowel wall thickening >3 mm.
Mural gas

name: Sagittal
dostring:
Save a still image or frame or video.
Demonstrate compressibility.
Measure size.
optimize: Investigate area of maximal pain and tenderness.
measure:
Abnormal = non-compressible, > 6 mm.
Hyperechoic appendicolith with posterior shadowing.
Periappendiceal flud collection.
Mural hyperemia with increased color flow.

name: Transverse
dostring:
Save a still image or frame or video.
Demonstrate compressibility.
Measure size.
optimize: Investigate area of maximal pain and tenderness.
measure:
Abnormal = non-compressible, > 6 mm.
Hyperechoic appendicolith with posterior shadowing.
Periappendiceal flud collection.
Mural hyperemia with increased color flow.

name: TAB Sagittal Uterus
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Fan through the entire uterus.
Look for multiple and extra-uterine gestations.
Confirm IUP with yolk sac+.
optimize:
Gestational sac/double decidual sign is insufficient to confirm IUP.
Take a close look at the adnexa.

name: TAB Transverse Uterus
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Fan through the entire uterus.
Look for multiple and extra-uterine gestations.
Confirm IUP with yolk sac+.
optimize:
Gestational sac/double decidual sign is insufficient to confirm IUP.
Take a close look at the adnexa.

name: TV Sagittal Uterus
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Fan through the entire uterus.
Look for multiple and extra-uterine gestations.
Confirm IUP with yolk sac+.
optimize:
Gestational sac/double decidual sign is insufficient to confirm IUP.
Take a close look at the adnexa.

name: TV Transverse Uterus
dostring:
Save a loop or video.
Fan through the entire uterus.
Look for multiple and extra-uterine gestations.
Confirm IUP with yolk sac+.
optimize:
Gestational sac/double decidual sign is insufficient to confirm IUP.
Take a close look at the adnexa.

name: Crown Rump Length
dostring: Measure from crown to rump.

name: EMM
dostring:
Save a still image or frame.
Measure from edge of gestational sac to outer edge of the myometrium.
optimize: Use Zoom.
measure: Normal EMM > 8 mm.

name: Fetal Heart Rate
dostring:
Use M-mode.
Select two peaks 1 or 2 beats apart (machine dependent).
optimize:
Avoid pulse wave doppler.

measure: Normal FHR: 120 - 160 bpm.
